info.name: Dynalist Clean - Dark
info.description: Write with better readability. - This style increases readability with subtle improvements on typography and layout. - Please use the style with "Theme: Dark" (Settings > Preferences). Need a daytime style? Check out Dynalist Clean - Light. If you find the style useful, you could buy me a coffee.
info.additionalInfo:
- 202001, v3
    - the late "yearly update", Happy New Year
    - improvements on number children
    - improvements on checkbox
- 201812
